'Assumption College', affiliated with Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala, is one
of the largest and the most reputable NAAC accredited womenâs colleges in the
state. For more than half a century, Assumption College has been providing
higher education. The college won the prestigious R Shankar Award from the
government of Kerala for the best college in the state in 1996-97, one of the
first colleges to be so honored. Nearly 2000 students study at this college.

For many years the college has held undisputed sway over the sports and games
fields, becoming the first recipients of the Kerala Sports Councilâs Award for
the best college in sports and games. Thrice, the college was the champion in
the prestigious College Games, conducted by Kerala Sports Council. Many of our
athletes have distinguished themselves at national and international meets.

Faculty member Dr. I'ma Neerakkal was honoured with the Young Scientist Award by
the government of Kerala. Not even a single year has passed without University
Ranks. For years, our students have represented Kerala in the national level
Youth Parliament Competitions and have became the Best Parliamentarian Awardees.
Many of our students have distinguished themselves as kalathilakam in various
University Youth Festivals. Olympian Chitra K Soman, SAF Games Medalist K.M
Greeshma, Urvasi Award Winner Meera Jasmine are all Assumption girls.
